name: Lands of Rage
description:
Story


In a magical land lives a group of friends-wizards Gribski, Daria and Ned. All their lives they competed with another wizard Donovan and his team and were irreconcilable rivals with them. One day, Gribski found out that Donovan had performed a great feat, which was even written about in the newspaper. Now friends need to perform two feats to prove that they are better. This is not an easy task, and they had to call for help their classmate Macita, who has been living in a dungeon for a long time, is engaged in dark magic, dreams of taking over the world and does not communicate with anyone.

What kind of game is this


This is a dynamic action game with a side view, where you have to navigate through various locations and fight huge crowds of enemies. Use magic, shoot, hit, push, blow up, jump, fly.

You have to control the wizard. You can choose from several characters. As the game progresses, the wizard can be changed to another, more suitable one. Each wizard has his own unique spells. Everyone has several attacking and defensive spells.

  • Gribski freezes and stops many targets at once, can build an ice wall to protect against enemies.
  • Daria sets fire and blows up.
  • Ned brandishes an electric sword, can fly and run like lightning.
  • Macita commands the undead. Summons skeletons who fight for her.

The goal of the game is to defeat the leader in each level. You can move freely around the map, fighting aggressive creatures, collecting souls and resources. Souls and resources will strengthen your spells. This is the only way you can defeat the leader. There will be a lot of enemies, simple and complex, with different skills. They will fight, shoot, try to throw you out or block you. Get ready to move fast and use your spells. Find places where hostile creatures gather and fight them. Set fire to the forest, stir up the nest of the undead and withstand the onslaught of hundreds of its inhabitants in a dynamic battle!

Play with your friends


You can go on an adventure with your friends and choose several wizards at the same time. Together you will not only become stronger. A friend can heal you or lift you up if you fall. He or she will help you with protective spells. But know that there will be even more enemies! And for the most desperate, you can raise the difficulty level.

The game also has a PVP mode, as well as a competitive highscore mode.
